description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget page 'ProtocolsPage' for managing protocol goals, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting goals with pagination and dialog forms.

classes.name: ProtocolsPage
classes.description: Main page widget for displaying and managing protocol goals, supporting CRUD operations, pagination, and dialog forms.

classes.name: _ProtocolsPageState
classes.description: State class handling the logic and UI for ProtocolsPage, including loading data, showing progress/error, and user interactions.

classes.name: _PaginationBar
classes.description: Stateless widget to display pagination controls (Previous/Next buttons).

classes.name: _GoalFormDialog
classes.description: Stateful widget rendering a form dialog for creating or editing ProtocolGoal entries.

classes.name: _GoalFormDialogState
classes.description: State class managing form data, validation, and submission logic within _GoalFormDialog.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the main page UI, including header, list of protocol goals, and pagination controls.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Lifecycle method to initialize data load when dependencies change.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows confirmation dialog and calls provider to delete a protocol goal if confirmed.

methods.name: _openForm
methods.description: Opens a dialog for creating or editing a protocol goal.
